definition: Bismarck (name)/Otto von Bismarck (1815-1898), Prussian politician, Minister-President of Prussia 1862-1873, Chancellor of Germany 1871-1890
in order that/so that/so as to/to cause sth
lit. to make night as day (idiom); fig. to burn the midnight oil/work especially hard
to make day as night (idiom, from Book of Songs); fig. to prolong one's pleasure regardless of the hour
Balochi (ethnic group of Iran, Pakistan and Afghanistan)

sentences.english: Mum, give me one hundred yuan.
Then I put Taro Mori Kizu home phone addresses are copied to him.
sentences.chinese: 隨後我把森木津太郎家嘅電話地址都抄俾咗佢。

sentences.english: Let me embrace you or let me live in your heart to eternty.
sentences.chinese: 等我攬住你或者俾我住系你個心度。

sentences.english: Do you agree or object to the Government in providing public housing to persons in prolonged poverty?
sentences.chinese: 你贊成定反對政府應該提供公屋俾長期赤貧既人士？

sentences.english: I received a call from Ann when I was having dinner tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚食飯果陣思紅打電話俾我，佢話。

sentences.english: I need to repay them even just a little bit.
sentences.chinese: 咁都要有番少少既回報俾番佢地既。

definition: Cantonese particle equivalent to 了[le5] or 過|过[guo4]
old variant of 慨[kai3]/to sigh (with emotion)
so (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 這樣|这样[zhe4 yang4]
to be at, in or on (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 在[zai4]
to know/to reprimand/to urge/to long for/to tell/to inform
(literary) to wipe away (tears)/to press with one's fingers/to soak
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
phonetic ga (used in rendering Tibetan and Mongolian sounds)/Tibetan Ge: language of Buddha/(dialect) final particle similar to 了[le5] (esp. in Yunnan)
to look down upon (classical)/to see/to look at (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 看[kan4]
to squint/what? (Cantonese)/see also 乜嘢[mie1 ye3]
